title: unable to connnect to chat, you may reconnect manualy.  help pls!!
body: i played just fine yesterday but now it wont let me log into the game chat  so i can play with friends or at least see who is on and i also cant type  in the game champ select i have searched the internet everywhere and have tried several things cuch as changing the date reinstaling league disabling ip helper an a few more things. someone pls help =/

replies.body: Another Texas user here, Just north of Houston. my ISP is Comcast if that helps. This occurred around 12-1AM Central Time and has persisted throughout the day. Please Advise!

Hey folks - 


We're currently investigating the issue. 

MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]
Are you in Texas by chance?
i assume you are having the same problem as well?
Yes I am. Someone else made a thread already.  http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/ITPxFeII-unable-to-connect-to-chat
